Sample number: All prostate tumors were staged according to the 2002 American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) TNM staging system
All prostate tumors were staged according to the seventh American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) system, I = 1, II = 2, III = 3, IV =4
Total serum prostate specific antigen (PSA) level at baseline
Gleason score were evaluated by 2 professional pathologists
The percentage of daily fat energy intake of the total energy, classified into three categories according to Chinese Dietary Reference Intake levels. 1=~20%,2=20-30%,3=30~
first-degree family history of prostate cancer =1, none=0
Relative mtDNA copy number (i.e. the ratio of mtDNA to nuclear DNA in the study samples normalized to a reference DNA sample)
